element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm generates a raster layer from a vector layer.

element.name: LAYER
element.text: The vector layer to be rasterized

element.name: FIELD
element.text: Values from this field will be used to set cell values when rasterizing each feature.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The rasterized vector layer. It will have valid values (taken from the selected field from the input layer) in those cells that overlap with a feature in the input layer, and no-data values in the remaining cells.
